entry.title: JKM Hook & Loop Coins- Pressure Senstive Circles
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 32.17 - 56.04 (60 variants)

Hook and Loop Coins - Pressure Sensitve Adhesive Back are circular pieces (dots) of hook or loop with a rubber-based adhesive backing & a peel-off release liner. The Coins are available in circles of 1/4", 3/8", 1/2", 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1", 1 3/8", 1 5/8 to 4" in Black, White and Beige. Each roll is 25 yards and we list the approximate number of coins on each roll for a particular size coin. The Hook Coins and the Loop Coins are sold separately.
(Product Characteristic: Fasteners) / (Fabric Content: Not Available)
